entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a wizard who asks about the kind of blood on the walls. He is described as speaking loudly over the chiming of the grandfather clock.

entities.name: horace
entities.description: Horace is mentioned as a wizard who responds to Dumbledore's question about the blood on the walls. He is described as shouting and speaking conversationally.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: Dragon is mentioned as the type of blood that was spilled on the walls, according to Horace.

relationships.description: Dumbledore asks a question about the blood on the walls, and Horace responds with an answer.
Horace identifies dragon as the source of the blood on the walls.
